headline.text: I build web applications that grow with your business.

bio: I build websites and apps that work whether you're processing a few transactions or thousands daily. From simple business sites to platforms that need to handle growth, I create solutions that stay fast and reliable.

services.title: What I Do
services.label: /Services
services.lede: I build complete websites and applications â€” from simple business sites to platforms that need to handle growth. Every project gets attention to quality and speed.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.label: /Projects
projects.lede: A mix of projects from beautiful, easy-to-use websites to business platforms that need to handle growth. Each one solves real problems with simple, effective solutions.

about.headline: I build web applications that scale, from startups to growing platforms.
about.body: I've worked on everything from small business websites to e-commerce platforms that handle significant transaction volumes. What I've learned from building systems that need to scale, I apply to every project. I think about how your website will perform as it grows, not just whether it works today. I'm always learning and growing, eager to take on new challenges.

contact.lede: Have a project in mind? Let's talk about how I can help build a solution that grows with your business.
